hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winner would be fully funded by Facebook to the Facebook hackathon in their headquarters.

The winner of the most technical hack shows an aptitude in utilizing hardware and/or software in their hacks. We are looking for hacks that shows an in-depth understanding of the hardware/software used.
Let your imagination run wild! We are looking for ideas that are inspiring and have the wow factor with it. The winner of this prize gets a $500 prize.
Winners would get a 1 TB hard drive.
Winners would get Domain.com Swag Bags
Develop a project that helps users better understand their digital footprint or control their personal data. Winners get Watch Dogs 2 Collector’s Edition for each member of the team.
Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment! Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment.
A $100 gift card for each time member from Autodesk will be awarded to the team that have the best use of 3D modelling in a web application
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of 3D in a web app

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Eligible submissions for Best Video Hack must be focused on video content, whether this is a creative implementation of video, a video processing app of some sort, or something else. We’ll be looking for projects that use video in the most interesting and technically impressive ways.The winning team will receive VIP tickets to the Daily Show with Trevor Noah – one for each member!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=41 Cooper Sq, New York, NY 10003, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How well is your idea executed? How much knowledge did you demonstrate through your hack?
Is your idea original? Does it have the wow factor in it?

hackathon-location-address: 41 Cooper Sq, New York, NY 10003, USA
hackathon-description-header: A hackathon to inspire the inventions of tomorrow!
